title: Watch: Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson Delivers Second Day of Walk-Off Heroics in Win Over Texas - Sports Illustrated
content:
1. Watch: Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson Delivers Second Day of Walk-Off Heroics in Win Over Texas  Sports Illustrated
  2. Two days, two walk-offs for Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson  MLB.com
  3. No. 16 Texas Tech hits walkoff grand slam in 16-12 win over No. 2 Texas in 10 innings  Burnt Orange Nation
  4. Grand slam walk-off lifts Tech past Texas in extras  KCBD
  5. Texas Tech – Texas: Kurt Wilson's 2 walk-offs in 2 days stun Longhorns  For The Win
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Wilson followed a surreal steal of home on Friday with a huge walk-off HR against the Longhorns.
